DOC.brief_summary: Determination of the effects of sildenafil citrate and epoprostenol when used in combination in patients with pulmonary arterial hypertension
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy and Safety of Sildenafil Citrate Used in Combination With Intravenous Epoprostenol in PAH
DOC.criteria: Patients with pulmonary arterial hypertension caused by primary PAH, associated with connective tissue disease or following surgical repair of a congenital heart lesion PH other than PAH
